comment.text: This key displays the label "Last opened" for a column header in a table view, likely showing the last time a file or item was accessed. It's used to allow users to sort or view data based on recent access.

usage.context:
enable: locationRecentColumnIsEnabled,
 resizable: true,
 onChange: this.onColumnChange,
 },
